<item>
  <title>Global IT majors creating more energy efficient data centers </title>
  <link>http://www.computerworld.in/feature/global-it-majors-creating-more-energy-efficient-data-centers</link>
  <description><span class="field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden">Global IT majors creating more energy efficient data centers </span>

  <div class="field field--name-field-nwsl-title field--type-string-long field--label-above">
    <div class="field__label">Newsletter Title</div>
              <div class="field__item">IT majors create energy efficient data centers </div>
          </div>

  <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-teaser field--type-text-long field--label-above">
    <div class="field__label">Homepage Teaser</div>
              <div class="field__item"><p>For CIOs, power usage and maintenance expenditure of data centers is progressively turning out to be a vital challenge, making them explore alternate sources of energy for innovative power-saving tactics.</p></div>
          </div>

  <div class="field field--name-field-newsletter-teaser field--type-string-long field--label-above">
    <div class="field__label">Newsletter Teaser</div>
              <div class="field__item">CIOs now explore alternate sources of energy for innovative power-saving tactics.</div>
          </div>

  <div class="field field--name-field-strapline field--type-string-long field--label-above">
    <div class="field__label">Newsletter Strapline</div>
              <div class="field__item">Data centers</div>
          </div>
<span class="field field--name-uid field--type-entity-reference field--label-hidden"><span lang="" about="http://www.computerworld.in/user/1494" typeof="schema:Person" property="schema:name" datatype="" xml:lang="">vishalchawla</span></span>
